title: The Message to the Blackman in America
author: Elijah Muhammad
description: A foundational text detailing the history and theology of the original man, compiled from the teachings of the Honorable Elijah Muhammad.

title: The 120 Lessons
author: The Nation of Gods and Earths
description: The 'Book of Life' for the NGE. A compilation of the Supreme Wisdom lessons, Supreme Mathematics, and Supreme Alphabet.

title: How to Eat to Live
author: Elijah Muhammad
description: Crucial guidance on dietary laws and physical health as a foundation for mental and spiritual elevation.

title: Knowledge of Self
author: Supreme Understanding
description: A deep exploration of the science of self-mastery and the application of NGE principles in the modern world.

title: The Five Percenters
author: Michael Muhammad Knight
description: A detailed historical account of the rise of the Nation of Gods and Earths from the 1960s to the present day.

title: Lord Jamar on 5% Identity
author: VladTV
description: Lord Jamar clarifies the distinction between religion and culture, explaining the core identity of the Gods and Earths.

title: The GOD & EARTH Hour: Episode 1
author: The 5% Connection
description: Hosted by Minister Freedom and IC. A foundational build on the current state and mission of the Nation.

title: The GOD & EARTH Hour: Supreme Mathematics
author: The 5% Connection
description: Episode 6: A deep dive into the meaning and application of Supreme Mathematics in the 5% culture.

title: The 5% Influence on Hip-Hop
author: BET News
description: A comprehensive look at how NGE terminology and concepts became the linguistic backbone of Golden Era rap.

title: Harlem's God: The Legacy of Father Allah
author: Face2Face Africa
description: An article detailing the life and cultural impact of Clarence 13X, known as Allah the Father.

title: The Origin of 120 Lessons
author: NGE Education
description: An educational video explaining the history and purpose of the 120 lessons within the Nation.

title: The 12 Jewels of Life
author: NGE Media
description: A breakdown of the 12 Jewels: Knowledge, Wisdom, Understanding, Freedom, Justice, Equality, Food, Clothing, Shelter, Love, Peace, and Happiness.

title: The Role of the Earth
author: God & Earth Radio
description: A focused discussion on the divinity and role of women (Earths) within the Nation of Gods and Earths.

title: NGE Operational Manual
author: NGE Archives
description: A guide to the social ethics and organizational structure of the Nation of Gods and Earths.

title: Sunez on 5% in Hip Hop
author: PremiereHipHop
description: Sunez Allah discusses the deep intellectual and spiritual roots of the Five Percent Nation in the Hip Hop art form.
